books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: After her husband’s death, a woman returns with her daughter to her Smoky Mountain hometown, only to discover that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Characters’ lives begin to fall apart as a mysterious stranger discloses secrets to them; a stand-alone thriller.
books.name: THE STRANGER

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A psychiatrist becomes the target of a sociopath.
books.name: EVERY FIFTEEN MINUTES

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: Free-spirited Ruby breathes life into buttoned-down, recently divorced Niall.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL SECRET

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands. There she begins an affair with James Fraser, a redheaded soldier. Originally published in 1991.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Aurora Rose Reynolds
books.description: An overprotective father must realize his daughter has found the one.
books.name: UNTIL JULY

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Investigating the disappearance of a billionaire’s son, Detective Zach Jordan and his partner (and ex-girlfriend) find themselves in the midst of a conspiracy.
books.name: NYPD RED 3

books.author: by Jude Deveraux
books.description: The first installment of the Nantucket Brides trilogy/
books.name: TRUE LOVE

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: A socialite travels to the Scottish Highlands with her husband and his friend, who are searching for the Loch Ness monster; there she uncovers secrets about her husband and family.
books.name: AT THE WATER'S EDGE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not yet meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: A lawyer pursues an attractive pilot.
books.name: HOT PURSUIT
